title: Cisco wants to give your office meeting room a major upgrade
description: New Cisco Room Bar Pro is a major meeting upgrade - and it's built for Microsoft Teams.

title: Siri is not a chatbot and that may be just the way Apple likes it
description: Apple puts platforms and Vision Pro at the center of WWDC 2023 and mostly leaves flashy AI behind

title: Raspberry Pi shipments are rising, but prices aren't
description: Eben Upton shares details about plans to reach one million shipments per month, maintaining rock-bottom pricing.

title: Indie banger Dead Cells roars past 10m sales - support and updates confirmed until 2025
description: Dead Cells has sold more than 10 million copies since its launch, but has also confirmed updates and support will run until at least 2025.

title: iOS 17 will finally cover up AirDrop flashers
description: Apple’s communication safety features are fixing a long-standing AirDrop issue, that women are usually the victims of.

title: Latest Marvel Snap season pass crosses over with Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: Marvel Snap's latest season pass is live, and it's all about Across the Spider-Verse.

title: The Apple Vision Pro is the strangest camera ever made
description: The Apple Vision Pro VR headset can capture spatial 3D photos and videos, but it won't be replacing my camera any time soon.

title: Free VPN user data leaked in Telegram group
description: The leak raises "concern about how VPN providers manage their own security/privacy," said experts. Here's all you need to know.

title: Our favorite free video editing software gets unexpected performance boost from new macOS Sonoma
description: Revealed at WWDC 2023, macOS Sonoma improves remote and hybrid workflows for professional video editors.

title: KeePass releases fix for password-leaking security bug
description: A bug allowed threat actors to pull master passwords in cleartext.

title: Captain America 4's new title ties into a shocking Marvel comic series
description: Captain America: New World Order has undergone a new change – and it might give us an idea of what the film's plot will entail.

title: Salesforce report claims AI can save marketers hours a week
description: New research suggests marketers should broaden their skillsets as artificial intelligence eases workload.

title: 7 must-stream movies on Netflix in June 2023
description: Netflix's summer selection ranges from the horrors of war to cursed DVDs and men "waggling their bits".

title: Zoom will now use AI to sum up that meeting you missed
description: Two of Zoom’s generative AI assistants have arrived, and five more are coming “soon” to help you work more quickly.

title: Apple Vision Pro: your 7 biggest questions about the headset answered
description: The Apple Vision Pro is an exciting but complex device that raises a lot of questions. We've answered all of the biggest ones here.

title: Diablo 4 now has DLSS 3 support with Rachet and Clank: Rift Apart to follow
description: Nvidia has confirmed that Diablo 4 now supports DLSS 3, as well as older iterations of the software for framerate boosts.

title: The new Apple Vision Pro headset will let you run Microsoft Word, Excel and Teams in augmented reality
description: The Apple Vision Pro headset has been shown off at this year's WWDC, and Microsoft was along for the ride.

title: Sony WF-1000XM5 earbuds' spec sheet just got leaked and it's (some) good news
description: Images of the WF-1000XM5 have leaked, alongside a spec sheet that's said to show the weight, design and battery life of Sony's next flagship buds.

title: Clop ransomware gang admits MoveIT attack following Microsoft accusation
description: The Russia-linked group admits breaching the file transfer program via a zero-day.

title: Apple Mac Pro 2023 goes on sale with less RAM, more expensive storage and these $400 wheels
description: Order your new Mac Pro and get it next week if you want to!

title: We finally know when the watchOS 10 beta is coming, and which Apple Watches can run it
description: The watchOS 10 beta is set to land “next month”. Can your Apple Watch support it?

title: Move over Twitter, Apple's Journal app is the blogging revolution I've been waiting for
description: Announced at WWDC, Apple's new Journal app could stand to completely reshape the blogging and journaling space

title: The WD Black C50 Xbox Expansion Card is here - and is cheaper than we thought
description: WD Black's C50 Expansion Card for Xbox is finally here, and much cheaper than early leaks suggested.

title: Apple just honored these 12 apps with its ultimate award – download them now
description: Marvel Snap, Duolingo, Headspace, and twelve other apps and games have been awarded top honors by Apple.

title: Safari is getting friendlier with passkeys
description: iCloud Keychain now supports password and passkey sharing as part of wider Safari updates to macOS Sonoma, iOS 17.

title: Hit the road with Orange's seriously powerful portable speakers
description: Orange is the latest iconic music brand to bring its speaker savvy to the world of Bluetooth audio.

title: Boots, BA and BBC have data stolen in cyber attack
description: First MOVEit victims are emerging, and more are probably yet to come.

title: Gigabyte releases fix for motherboard security flaws, so patch now
description: The updater can no longer be abused to push malware, the company confirms.

title: Death Stranding is coming to Mac along with future Kojima games
description: Hideo Kojima himself revealed that Death Stranding would be coming to Mac in a recent announcement, with more titles to follow.

title: Xbox executive promises primarily "in-game footage" at Xbox Games Showcase
description: VP of Xbox Games Marketing has stated that first party games won't be revealed with trailers at the Xbox Games Showcase.

title: This malware is evolving to become more dangerous than ever
description: For Qbot, disabling macros was but a minor setback.

description: The new Apple Mac Studio M2 (2023) is officially here, and these are its key upgrades.
